body_html:
Hello, maybe I'm a little bit late but I've encountered the same problem when building pytorch from source:

[ 90%] Linking CXX executable basic
../libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `convolve_5x5_sse'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_tensor_test.dir/build.make:107: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/scalar_tensor_test' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/test/scalar_tensor_test] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:319: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_tensor_test.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_tensor_test.dir/all] Error 2
../libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `convolve_5x5_sse'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/basic.dir/build.make:107: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/basic' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/test/basic] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:356: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/basic.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/basic.dir/all] Error 2
[ 91%] Linking CXX executable scalar_test
../libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `convolve_5x5_sse'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_test.dir/build.make:107: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/scalar_test' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/test/scalar_test] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:393: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_test.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_test.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:129: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2

Full log is here: build.log

Here's how I tried to install it:

root@Homeserver:/opt/pytorch# git show
commit 677030b1cb12a2ff32fe85a3c2b9cc547ef47de8
...
root@Homeserver:/opt/pytorch# source /opt/anaconda3/bin/activate
(base) root@Homeserver:/opt/pytorch# python --version
Python 3.6.4 :: Anaconda custom (64-bit)
(base) root@Homeserver:/opt/pytorch# export NO_CUDA=1
(base) root@Homeserver:/opt/pytorch# export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="$(dirname $(which conda))/../"
(base) root@Homeserver:/opt/pytorch# nohup python setup.py install > build.log 2>&1 &

My system: Ubuntu 16.04
conda: 4.4.10
gcc: 4.8.5 .

/proc/cpuinfo: cpuinfo.txt

body:
Hello, maybe I'm a little bit late but I've encountered the same problem when building pytorch from source:

```
[ 90%] Linking CXX executable basic
../libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `convolve_5x5_sse'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_tensor_test.dir/build.make:107: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/scalar_tensor_test' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/test/scalar_tensor_test] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:319: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_tensor_test.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_tensor_test.dir/all] Error 2
../libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `convolve_5x5_sse'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/basic.dir/build.make:107: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/basic' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/test/basic] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:356: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/basic.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/basic.dir/all] Error 2
[ 91%] Linking CXX executable scalar_test
../libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `convolve_5x5_sse'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_test.dir/build.make:107: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/scalar_test' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/test/scalar_test] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:393: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_test.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_test.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:129: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
```
Full log is here: [build.log](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1727185/build.log)

Here's how I tried to install it:
```
root@Homeserver:/opt/pytorch# git show
commit 677030b1cb12a2ff32fe85a3c2b9cc547ef47de8
...
root@Homeserver:/opt/pytorch# source /opt/anaconda3/bin/activate
(base) root@Homeserver:/opt/pytorch# python --version
Python 3.6.4 :: Anaconda custom (64-bit)
(base) root@Homeserver:/opt/pytorch# export NO_CUDA=1
(base) root@Homeserver:/opt/pytorch# export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="$(dirname $(which conda))/../"
(base) root@Homeserver:/opt/pytorch# nohup python setup.py install > build.log 2>&1 &
```

My system: Ubuntu 16.04
conda: 4.4.10
gcc: 4.8.5 .

`/proc/cpuinfo`: [cpuinfo.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1727184/cpuinfo.txt)
